verses.name: Ezekiel 12:10
verses.text: Say thou unto them, Thus saith the Lord God; This burden concerneth the prince in Jerusalem, and all the house of Israel that are among them.

verses.name: Ezekiel 12:11
verses.text: Say, I am your sign: like as I have done, so shall it be done unto them: they shall remove and go into captivity.

verses.name: Ezekiel 12:12
verses.text: And the prince that is among them shall bear upon his shoulder in the twilight, and shall go forth: they shall dig through the wall to carry out thereby: he shall cover his face, that he see not the ground with his eyes.
